mapper.sql: recommend_product_id AS recommendProductId, recommend_id AS recommendId, product_id AS productId, sort, status, begin_time AS beginTime, end_time AS endTime, create_time AS createTime, create_by AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_by AS updateBy
mapper.select: SELECT recommend_product_id AS recommendProductId, p.product_id AS productId, product_number AS productNumber, name, show_price AS showPrice, introduce, pic_img AS picImg, comment_number AS commentNumber FROM os_product_recommend r LEFT JOIN os_product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN os_product_attribute a ON a.product_id = p.product_id WHERE recommend_id = #{recommendId} AND r.status = #{status} AND p.show_in_shelve = #{status} AND begin_time <= #{date} AND end_time >= #{date} ORDER BY sort LIMIT ${showNumber}

SELECT comment_id AS commentId, user_name AS userName, content FROM os_product_recommend r LEFT JOIN os_comment c ON c.product_id = r.product_id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} AND c.status = #{status} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
